rules_text:
Multikicker {E}{E} [i](You may pay an additional {E}{E} any number of times as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Teach each of up to X target creatures trample. Repeat this process for each time this spell was kicked. [i](Put a Repeat counter on it. If it already has Repeat, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
If this spell wasn't kicked, you get X {E}.
